SELECT pmc.product_category_code, pmc.group_flag, pmc.product_group_code, pmc.product_main_category_image,
wpm.product_category_name FROM product_main_category pmc LEFT OUTER JOIN winia_product_mst wpm ON(wpm.product_category_code = pmc.product_category_code) WHERE pmc.company_code = #{company_code};

SELECT tst.trouble_code, tst.trouble_symptom FROM trouble_symptom_table tst LEFT OUTER JOIN trouble_product_category tpc ON(tpc.trouble_code = tst.trouble_code) WHERE tpc.product_category_code = #{category_code};
